description: '''Tecno brega''' or '''technobrega''' (technotacky) is a form of [[music]] from [[North Region, Brazil|northern]] [[Brazil]], particularly [[Belém]], [[Pará (state)|Pará]].  Music of the genre is created primarily through [[remixing]] and reworking songs from [[popular music]] and music from the eighties.  While there is a large amount of famous music used in tecno brega, the majority of it is original material (80%).  Several [[DJ]]s and music producers from the tecno brega movement were featured in the [[peer-to-peer filesharing]] documentary ''[[Good Copy Bad Copy]]''.
